courses.title: Beginner Guitar Master
courses.description: A complete beginner-friendly course to learn basic chords, strumming patterns, and simple songs.

courses.title: Piano Essentials for Starters
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of piano, hand placement, notes, and beginner melodies.

courses.title: Advanced Music Production
courses.description: Master professional mixing, mastering, and sound design techniques for modern music.

courses.title: Vocal Training & Singing Basics
courses.description: Improve your vocal range, breathing control, and singing confidence with structured lessons.

courses.title: Beat Making for Beginners
courses.description: Learn how to create beats, use drum patterns, and compose catchy loops.

courses.title: Classical Violin Foundations
courses.description: Start your violin journey with classical techniques and basic melodies.

courses.title: DJ Mixing & Live Performance
courses.description: Learn professional DJ skills including beatmatching, mixing, and live performance techniques.

courses.title: Flute Basics for Beginners
courses.description: A simple and engaging course to learn flute breathing, tone, and beginner tunes.
